005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * A base class for a field that is a member of a containing model.
014 *
015 * @param <PARENT>
016 *          the Java type of the parent model (i.e., assembly, choice,
017 *          choiceGroup).
018 * @param <DEFINITION>
019 *          the Java type of the definition for this member field
020 * @param <INSTANCE>
021 *          the Java type of the instance for this member field
022 * @param <PARENT_DEFINITION>
023 *          the Java type of the containing assembly definition
024 */
025public abstract class AbstractFieldInstance<
026    PARENT extends IContainerModel,
027    DEFINITION extends IFieldDefinition,
028    INSTANCE extends IFieldInstance,
029    PARENT_DEFINITION extends IAssemblyDefinition>
030    extends AbstractNamedModelInstance<PARENT, PARENT_DEFINITION>
031    implements IFieldInstance, IFeatureDefinitionReferenceInstance<DEFINITION, INSTANCE> {
032
033  /**
034   * Construct a new field instance.
035   *
036   * @param parent
037   *          the parent model containing this instance
038   */
039  protected AbstractFieldInstance(@NonNull PARENT parent) {
040    super(parent);
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public DEFINITION getDefinition() {
045    // this should always be not null
046    return ObjectUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
047        getContainingModule()
048            .getScopedFieldDefinitionByName(getReferencedDefinitionQName())));
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Generates a "coordinate" string for the assembly instance.
053   *
054   * @return the coordinate
055   */
056  @SuppressWarnings("null")
057  @Override
058  public String toCoordinates() {
059    IDefinition definition = getDefinition();
060    return String.format("field instance %s -> %s in module %s (@%d(%d)",
061        getXmlQName(),
062        definition.getDefinitionQName(),
063        getContainingDefinition().getContainingModule().getShortName(),
064        hashCode(),
065        definition.hashCode());
066  }
067}
